testcase.classname: As a customer, I want to register new account
testcase.name: Register new user
testcase.system-out: Given Homepage Amazone website..............................................passed And Navigate to Account & List..............................................passed And Open register page from sign in page....................................passed And Register page should be displayed.......................................passed When Input customer name with "John Doe"....................................passed And Input customer email with "johndoe@mail.com"............................passed And Input customer password with "P@55w0rd".................................passed And Input customer re-password with "P@55w0rd"..............................passed And Click continue button...................................................passed
